Text.Page:
Ever since the {@LinkCreature:40#11#selvaras scouts} appeared, people have been disappearing. Perhaps they're being sold into slaveryâ€”certainly no one has asked for ransom.

Killing a few of them might make them think again, so I'm offering a ransom for any identifying tokens you find on the bodies.

You didn't see any of the missing people? None at all?

That means they're probably already far away.

Thank you for helping, though.
I'm sure the {@LinkCreature:40#11#selvaras scouts} have some sort of identifying tokens. That's what I need.
